title: Meadow Application Sleep
description: Meadow can be put into a power-saving sleep state. In this state, your code stops executing and reduces the power draw to only what is required to recover from being in a sleep state. After resuming from a sleep state, your code will resume executing where it left off.

frontMatter.title: Meadow Application Sleep
frontMatter.subtitle: Reduce power consumption by putting Meadow into a sleep state.
